attributes.action: Tax all religion in the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
Every religion in the U.K. should be taxed; as they currently, and have been for hundreds of years, profiting on the individuals of this nation.
If the religious clause pertains to being a 'charitable organisation' (i.e. friends of poverty, not of a solution), then they should be subject to EVERY law that every charitable organisation is.
